page.title: 11NEWSPAPERS IN AMMANFORD
page.content: The population of Ammanford and surrounding amounts to approximately 10,500. Ammanford itself is served by four paper shops, the main newsagent being G.O.Davies having two shops. The most popular dailies are {1st - The Western Mail;2nd-The Sun;3rd {-The Mirror. On Sunday the most popular is the {News of the World}and as a welsh comunity the most popular welsh newspaper is the weekly "{Y Cymro}" Ammanford has a weekly newspaper called "{The Guardian }".It looks at local news, interests, advertisments and sport. The paper is printed in Haverfordwest by C.J.Thomas on a computerised photo_typesetting process. It is part of the newspaper Group owned by Courier Press(Holdings)Ltd.of Leamingt on Spa.
